roleset.name: begin
roleset.note: COMMENCE-V NOTES: Refer to 'start' or 'begin' for examples with (ie) instrumentalsubjects or secondary predication. (from commence.01-v)

example.name: from the corpus
example.text: It includes *trace* removing $242 million in good will from the books, issuing $150 million in preferred stock and commencing an exchange offer for $52 million in convertible bonds.
example.arg: an exchange offer for $52 million in convertible bonds
